Questions.Question: Which animation studio created the movie 'Toy Story'?
Questions.Explanation: Pixar, a subsidiary of Disney, created the groundbreaking computer-animated film 'Toy Story' in 1995.

Questions.Question: Who is the creator of the animated TV series 'The Simpsons'?
Questions.Explanation: Matt Groening is the creator of the long-running animated TV series 'The Simpsons', which debuted in 1989.

Questions.Question: Which animation studio is known for producing 'Frozen' and 'Tangled'?
Questions.Explanation: Walt Disney Animation Studios is renowned for creating popular animated films like 'Frozen' and 'Tangled'.

Questions.Question: Who directed the animated film 'Spirited Away'?
Questions.Explanation: Hayao Miyazaki, a legendary Japanese filmmaker, directed the critically acclaimed animated film 'Spirited Away'.

Questions.Question: Which animation studio is responsible for 'Shrek' and 'Kung Fu Panda'?
Questions.Explanation: DreamWorks Animation is the studio behind popular animated franchises like 'Shrek' and 'Kung Fu Panda'.

Questions.Question: Who is the creator of the animated TV series 'Family Guy'?
Questions.Explanation: Seth MacFarlane is the creator of the animated TV series 'Family Guy', known for its irreverent humor.

Questions.Question: Which animation studio produced 'My Neighbor Totoro' and 'Princess Mononoke'?
Questions.Explanation: Studio Ghibli, a Japanese animation studio, is renowned for its enchanting films like 'My Neighbor Totoro' and 'Princess Mononoke'.

Questions.Question: Who directed the animated film 'Finding Nemo'?
Questions.Explanation: Andrew Stanton, a Pixar director, helmed the beloved animated film 'Finding Nemo' released in 2003.

Questions.Question: Which animation studio created the TV series 'South Park'?
Questions.Explanation: Trey Parker and Matt Stone are the creators of the animated TV series 'South Park', known for its satirical humor.

Questions.Question: Which animation studio is known for producing 'Ice Age' and 'Rio'?
Questions.Explanation: Blue Sky Studios is the animation studio behind popular films like 'Ice Age' and 'Rio'.

Questions.Question: Who directed the animated film 'The Lion King'?
Questions.Explanation: Roger Allers and Rob Minkoff co-directed the animated film 'The Lion King' released in 1994.

Questions.Question: Which animation studio is responsible for 'Wallace & Gromit' and 'Chicken Run'?
Questions.Explanation: Aardman Animations, a British studio, is known for its stop-motion animated films like 'Wallace & Gromit' and 'Chicken Run'.

Questions.Question: Who is the creator of the animated TV series 'Beavis and Butt-Head'?
Questions.Explanation: Mike Judge is the creator of the animated TV series 'Beavis and Butt-Head', known for its crude humor.

Questions.Question: Which animation studio produced 'Howl's Moving Castle' and 'Ponyo'?
Questions.Explanation: Studio Ghibli, a Japanese animation studio, is known for its visually stunning films like 'Howl's Moving Castle' and 'Ponyo'.

Questions.Question: Who directed the animated film 'Ratatouille'?
Questions.Explanation: Brad Bird, a Pixar director, helmed the critically acclaimed animated film 'Ratatouille' released in 2007.

Questions.Question: Which animation studio created the TV series 'Rick and Morty'?
Questions.Explanation: Justin Roiland and Dan Harmon are the creators of the animated TV series 'Rick and Morty', known for its dark humor and sci-fi themes.

Questions.Question: Which animation studio is known for producing 'Madagascar' and 'Kung Fu Panda'?
Questions.Explanation: DreamWorks Animation is the studio behind popular animated franchises like 'Madagascar' and 'Kung Fu Panda'.

Questions.Question: Who directed the animated film 'Inside Out'?
Questions.Explanation: Pete Docter, a Pixar director, helmed the emotionally resonant animated film 'Inside Out' released in 2015.

Questions.Question: Which animation studio created the movie 'Coco'?
Questions.Explanation: Pixar, a subsidiary of Disney, created the heartwarming animated film 'Coco' released in 2017.

Questions.Question: Who is the creator of the animated TV series 'Bob's Burgers'?
Questions.Explanation: Loren Bouchard is the creator of the animated TV series 'Bob's Burgers', known for its quirky humor.
